summary: While on vacation in the Caribbean with his wife, a middle-aged man unexpectedly finds, and falls in love with, a mermaid.
cast: William Powell|Ann Blyth|Irene Hervey|Andrea King|Clinton Sundberg|Art Smith|Hugh French|Lumsden Hare|Frederick Clarke|James Logan|Mary Field|Beatrice Roberts|Cynthia Corley|Tom Stevenson|Mary Somerville|Dick Ryan|Robert Hyatt|Ivan Browning|Lydia Bilbrook|Winifred Harris|Ola Lorraine|Carol Savage
keywords: saved by a mermaid|in love with mermaid|reference to a mermaid|falling in love with a mermaid|husband
title: Domador de sirenas
